tooltip.administrator: Users with access to all Watcha features, including this administration console. They cannot, however, access rooms in which they are not a member.
tooltip.collaborator: Users have the right to create rooms and invite existing users or new partners to them; they do not have access to other rooms. These are usually employees of your organization.
tooltip.partner: Users only have access to the rooms for which they have been invited; they do not have access to the member directory unless they are promoted to room administrator. These are usually guests from outside your organization.
tooltip.pendingInvitation: Users who have been invited, but have not yet set their password or logged in
